title: Dear Riot
body:
Why is the new client the worst thing to ever happen?  The status's are completely broken, my game freezes for 3 seconds every 2 minutes, i cant even view my friends profiles sometimes!  Please try and get this stuff fixed! i know that you guys are focusing on the Esports and stuff, but i think that the client is the most important thing there is right now.

Thank you.

P.S i didn't really know what tag to put this under.

replies.body:
Not sure exactly what's causing this so I'll get you to run through the steps in a few guides for me. Please be aware that this is a problem with *your* client, not with the client itself.

PERMISSIONS: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions
Having the wrong permissions can cause the install to be unstable and end up all dodgy, making things break or only half workm, this would be my best guess as to your problem.

PERFORMANCE ISSUES WITH LCU:
Enable “Low Spec Mode” and “Close Client During Game”. This will remove the LCU’s influence on in game performance. If problems persist then they can be investigated further.
In game issues are not caused by the LCU once the above steps are done as the LCU does not have any impact on in game files since the splash client and game client are seperate, and the game client has not changed. The only impact is negated by turning on “Close Client In Game”. If the problem persists then it lies elsewhere.

FPS: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-troubleshooting

CONNECTION: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues
I don't think connection is your problem, but anythings possible so I'll drop it here too, but I'd recommend leaving it till last.

TICKET SUPPORT: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
If all else fails, Player Support can help you more than I can, since they know all the ins and outs. But try the Permissions fixes at least first.
Thank you, this helps a lot!  If any thing continues to happen ill try reinstalling it. :)

Sorry I couldn't be more specific, it sounds like you probably have some combination of issues so it makes things pretty tricky, but those are the catch all (well catch most) steps for tech issues like this.
Don't worry its all good.  I think disabling UAC or whatever its called fixed the problem. :)
